files.description: The file assets in this manifest (Default - No files)

dockerImages.description: The Docker image assets in this manifest (Default - No Docker images)

FileSource.description: Describe the source of a file asset

executable.description: External command which will produce the file asset to upload. (Default - Exactly one of `executable` and `path` is required.)

path.description:
The filesystem object to upload

This path is relative to the asset manifest location. (Default - Exactly one of `executable` and `path` is required.)

packaging.description:
Packaging method

Only allowed when `path` is specified. (Default FILE)

FileDestination.description: Where in S3 a file asset needs to be published

region.description: The region where this asset will need to be published (Default - Current region)

assumeRoleArn.description: The role that needs to be assumed while publishing this asset (Default - No role will be assumed)

assumeRoleExternalId.description: The ExternalId that needs to be supplied while assuming this role (Default - No ExternalId will be supplied)

DockerImageSource.description: Properties for how to produce a Docker image from a source

directory.description:
The directory containing the Docker image build instructions.

This path is relative to the asset manifest location. (Default - Exactly one of `directory` and `executable` is required)

executable.description:
A command-line executable that returns the name of a local
Docker image on stdout after being run. (Default - Exactly one of `directory` and `executable` is required)

dockerFile.description:
The name of the file with build instructions

Only allowed when `directory` is set. (Default Dockerfile)

dockerBuildTarget.description:
Target build stage in a Dockerfile with multiple build stages

Only allowed when `directory` is set. (Default - The last stage in the Dockerfile)

dockerBuildArgs.description:
Additional build arguments

Only allowed when `directory` is set. (Default - No additional build arguments)

dockerBuildSsh.description:
SSH agent socket or keys

Requires building with docker buildkit. (Default - No ssh flag is set)

dockerBuildSecrets.description:
Additional build secrets

Only allowed when `directory` is set. (Default - No additional build secrets)

networkMode.description:
Networking mode for the RUN commands during build. _Requires Docker Engine API v1.25+_.

Specify this property to build images on a specific networking mode. (Default - no networking mode specified)

platform.description:
Platform to build for. _Requires Docker Buildx_.

Specify this property to build images on a specific platform/architecture. (Default - current machine platform)

dockerOutputs.description: Outputs (Default - no outputs are passed to the build command (default outputs are used))

cacheFrom.description: Cache from options to pass to the `docker build` command. (Default - no cache from options are passed to the build command)

cacheTo.description: Cache to options to pass to the `docker build` command. (Default - no cache to options are passed to the build command)

DockerCacheOption.description: Options for configuring the Docker cache backend

type.description:
The type of cache to use.
Refer to https://docs.docker.com/build/cache/backends/ for full list of backends. (Default - unspecified)

params.description:
Any parameters to pass into the docker cache backend configuration.
Refer to https://docs.docker.com/build/cache/backends/ for cache backend configuration. (Default {} No options provided)

repositoryName.description: Name of the ECR repository to publish to

imageTag.description: Tag of the image to publish

region.description: The region where this asset will need to be published (Default - Current region)

assumeRoleArn.description: The role that needs to be assumed while publishing this asset (Default - No role will be assumed)

assumeRoleExternalId.description: The ExternalId that needs to be supplied while assuming this role (Default - No ExternalId will be supplied)
